text: Corvette Summer is a 1978 American adventure comedy movie directed by Matthew Robbins and starring Mark Hamill, Annie Potts, Eugene Roche, William Bryant, Richard McKenzie, Kim Milford, Stanley Kamel, Brion James, Dick Miller. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:1978 adventure movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Matthew Robbins
title: Corvette Summer
